Text:
Many thanks esharoth! Games works 100%.
Do you plan uploading more GOG Mac games? Thanks!

Not really planning to, as I don't actually own a MAC. I uploaded this one by request.

There's this torrent with 33 other MAC games from GOG, though:

thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7862085/[MAC]_Ultimate_GOG_Collection_(33_games)

Many thanks for your reply esharoth. I already spotted that torrent, but Mac GOG games are pretty elusive. I own a few, but do you know by chance if more Mac GOG games a part from these 33 are available somewhere else? Thanks again!
Just a request for you or anyone you know... I would LOVE to find a Mac copy (wineskin or whatever) copy of Sanitarium. Loved that game. Thanks for this upload too!
I think it would be better to post the request for that on the forums, so more people would see it.

esharoth, thank you SO much for this.

_RADIUS_, unbelievable! I actually *own* that game, AND have it for wineskin. let me see if i can manage to make a torrent for you.

I get a error trying to run this game. Is there a update or a chance for a re-up? 

After I select Alpha or Alien it bombs with a terran.exe encountered a problem.
There have been no updates released for the MAC version, sorry.
